 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְרִים‎</span> **proper name, of a location** ==in Moab== (compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נמרן‎</span> attributive of <abbr title="transliteration"><u>Bar‡m</u></abbr>, [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxix (1875), 592</sup>, see also [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv. No. 103, p. 169</sup>; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wholesome water*** [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>2853</sup>, also [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>l.c</sup>.); — only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי נִמְרִים‎</span> [[Isa.15.6|Isa 15:6]]; [[Jer.48.34|Jer 48:34]] probably = <span class="bdbLangGreek">Βηνναμαρειμ</span> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Onom. 284, 33, in</sup> ***Wady Numêre*** at southeast end of Dead Sea, [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Geogr. 272</sup>.
